title: The Road

జీవితమే ఒక పయనం, కాదేదీ కవితకనర్హం! ☺️

 ![](img-20201121-wa0006.jpg) The road,<br>
She has always been as lovely as she is.<br>
It is I,<br>
It is I, that has changed,<br>
And so has the pleasure of taking her!<br>
The road,<br>
She has always been as lovely as she is.<br>
I see now,<br>
It is I,<br>
It is I, that needed to change<br>
To better enjoy the pleasure of taking her!
